website_summaries.verdict: Highest rated product, designed for Olympic, professional, and collegiate athletes.
pros: Whey, casein, and egg white blend for slow release and maximum gains
Uses the isolate forms as opposed to the concentrate forms
Low carb and low sodium formula
Promotes digestive health and is good for those with a sensitive stomach
Blended mix of three proteins, making it a great choice for those who don't need a lactose-free option
cons: Some users complain of a metallic aftertaste

customer_reviews.title: Best protein powder taste mixed with just water
customer_reviews.text: I never think "Chocolate Peanut Butter" or whatever it is that they tell you that the flavors are when I drink protein blends. That said, mixed with just water, Trutein provides the best flavor (Chocolate Peanut Butter is more like "essence of. . .") that I've ever tasted. Also, it blends very smoothly and even gets a bit foamy. If you're going to blend with milk alternatives like almond milk, get the original or unsweetened version of the almond milk. The blend will likely be too sweet, otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn Higgs

customer_reviews.title: The best protein powder I've ever tasted.
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the red velvet cake flavor and loved it so much I ordered the birthday cake flavor the same day. This is the best protein powder I've ever tried and I've tried many infer the years. I love that you can make shakes, pudding, use it in flavoring other foods etc. it has no aftertaste and smells and taste fantastic. I bought popcicle molds and made popcicle which my best friend had no idea she was eating a protein supplement :)~
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Lane

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical about getting this protein, but I looked over all the reviews and took my chances. Well.............I am very happy I did. I love the taste of this protein and how it keeps me full until lunch time. I add peanut butter and blend it up and it taste amazing!! I look forward to having it every day. I got the vanilla bean to be on the safe side and I all the people I know that you won't go wrong getting this. I am going to order another one, but this time I am going to try a different flavor. The price is so worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Flor Benitez

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best tasting protein on the planet!!
customer_reviews.text: I will gladly tell the world about this protein until the day I die. My 3 favorite flavors are the vanilla, mocha, and cinnamon bun. I make an incredible snack w/ the vanilla using thawed frozen blueberries (or mixed berries), 1/2 a scoop of vanilla trutein, and plan greek yogurt (i change up the % of fat in the yogurt based on my current macros). It's like dessert!!! I make protein shakes using mocha or cinnamon bun and use unsweetened vanilla almond milk. Those also taste like dessert! I really can't recommend this protein enough.
customer_reviews.author: cdywks

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch?
customer_reviews.text: I tried Trutein’s pumpkin pie flavor and it was good enough. I went through a 2 lb tub if it. I like the fact that it’s a blend off egg white, whey and casein. The Lemon pie smells amazing. It’s tastes okay. However, my stomach could not handle it at all. Within 2 hours of my shake I was running to the bathroom. The pumpkin pie didn’t do this to me so I don’t know if I got a bad batch or what but now I’m afraid to try this brand anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Its extremely powdery. I would scoop a cup of protein and pour it in my shaker, dust powder flies every where. I have never seen a protein powder that does this before. This is a little bit of a con for me. BUT, I do like the fact that it uses 3 types of protein. I drink this before I sleep because of the casein. Taste is like a 2.5 out of 5 for me. But I dont care about that to be honest. As long as it's helping me get gains, thats all I care about.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Taste great!
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great! Keeps you feeling full longer, very impressed on how natural the lemon flavor turned out to be, I used water to prepare it, because I wanted to see how the flavor would be by itself. Me and my husband both love it. It's thicker than regular protein powder due to the casein, which is great, super delicious! Especially for lemon lovers
customer_reviews.author: Tonni Langford

customer_reviews.title: ... protein powders & this one is my all time favorite. I always order the vanill bean flavor because ...
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several different protein powders & this one is my all time favorite. I always order the vanill bean flavor because it's versatile. I can add peanut butter powder, or blend up blueberries in it, or even add yogurt to the mix. The flavor is really good on its own, better than any other protein powder I have ever tasted. My favorite blend is made with unsweetened vanilla almond milk, peanut butter powder, & chia seeds. I will continue to purchase trutein again & again as I have done many times before because it's a good product & it's my breakfast almost every morning & I love it.
customer_reviews.author: S.J.One

customer_reviews.title: So tasty , just like drinking a pie through a straw
customer_reviews.text: Now what can I say about this ? The Lemon meringue just taste like lemon meringue, its so tasty and only used half scoop /pouch . Probably one full pouch or scoop would be too sweet for me as I usually dont have sugar in food . I've put it in greek yogurt with banana and put in yogurt and walnuts , very tasty . It's one of the best tasting favours I've had in a long time. I've just ordered another 10 single servings of this flavour and a 2lb tub of banana as that taste really nice too
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Allergic to Trutein, now stuck with giant tub
customer_reviews.text: I’m so bummed! I love the taste and it mixes well with my oatmeal and coffee - but turns out I’m allergic :(. Watch for black stool, it means your upper gastrointestinal tract is bleeding which is a sign of an allergic reaction to whey protein. Guess I’ll have to switch to plant-based protein. Worst part is that now I have a giant container of protein that I have no idea what to do with. Wish they had a money back guarantee!
customer_reviews.author: Tia B.

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting protein shake I have had
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a good tasting protein product, which packs a good amount per serving, look no further as Trutein is your product. They have different flavors (which all taste good, you can order samples) but by far the Chocolate Peanut Butter is my favorite. Even when mixing with only water it is not bad, but I mix mine with milk and it is phenomenal. No powdery taste, not gritty... goes down smooth and easy. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo W.

customer_reviews.title: Low solubility and way too sweet
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this, but it is waaaaay too sweet (if they cut the sweetness by half, it would be tolerable, but as is, it's nausea-inducing). Equally as important is that it doesn't dissolve well at all, either with manual or mechanical agitation. I've tried it with hot and cold liquids and it's the same either way - it leaves a sludge at the bottom of the containers, because it's not very soluble. Disappointed, particularly given the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Lemon meringue is yummy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the lemon meringue and the pb marshmallow. I love the Lemon meringue but the PB marshmallow is not nearly as good and I can’t taste the pb so well. May need to add some real pb to help it or mix w chocolate. I love Trutein because it’s so smooth and mixes easily w water. I’ve tried a lot of protein powders but this one is the best especially just w after alone. Highly recommend Trutein.
customer_reviews.author: Nursegirl621

customer_reviews.title: Like all Trutein products... GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I am making my own no fat, no cholesterol Greek yougurt cream cheese. Add a little of this and it makes a fantastic filling for cheesecake. For the topping just layer on the non-fat Greek yogurt. YUM!! Addendum 10-20-2019..... makes a great coffee creamer, but cool the coffee teensy amount so mixes smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey but good
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product on and off for quite a few years. The original formula was 40:40:20. When they cheaped out and changed it to 45:45:10 you can tell that the quality went down. Before it was as good as it gets. Now it's above average. Still good though. It works and tastes great
customer_reviews.author: Random Person

customer_reviews.title: Warning if on low carb diet - macros have changed
customer_reviews.text: Warning - it appears that the formula for some of the Trutein powders have changed. It used to be 25g protein per scoop, but now is 22g. The part that annoyed me most is that the carb content is now higher per scoop, too. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: KETOing_com

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product & great taste!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first larger supply of protein powder as I work towards a leaner stronger self. Great taste, not chalky, high protein AND it comes with a chocolate flavor!! I'll be honest, I cannot taste the PB flavor at all. Easily makes a meal supplement shake or add some to your yogurt! I'm ordering the banana flavor to mix things up. I also believe I can add more of a variety of fruits to the banana versus chocolate. You will like this product, be like me and get both! The chocolate is like a treat!
customer_reviews.author: H. Blaine

customer_reviews.title: A protein powder that tastes good
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying this protein powder, it tastes good and fills me up for a few hours. I am not getting any chemical taste at all which is good. The price for the amount is a good value. I just add water, milk, banana and blend and im all set. Good buy +++ Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A. Lindenbaum

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I use this protein powder as my breakfast after my workouts. The chocolate peanut butter cup is delicious. I mix the powder with almond milk and frozen fruit then use my NutriBullet. It’s got a creamy, non grainy consistency. It keeps me full for an average of 4-5 hours. It also is much cheaper per serving to buy in bulk like this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: By far the best tasting protein I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: I had these delivered a few times on deployment. I like to mix my protein with milk, but being stuck with the Navy for a few months on a ship meant that the fat Chiefs got all the milk, so I had to mix with water. It tastes amazing, even with water. The blend also kept me pretty satiated for a few hours without the nasty, nauseous feeling I would get from other protein powders. Just make sure you keep the ol' blender bottle clean because as this powder is thick, it'll leave a lot of gunk if you let it sit for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: John Gregory Leos

customer_reviews.title: Great taste.
customer_reviews.text: One of the most delicious proteins ever. Love ths cinnabun flavor - although it can get tiring after a while - it tastes great. Nutritional profile for Trutein is also very good. Not a whole lot of filler - and good protein serving size. Tastes solid with water, and like a milkshake with milk. Price isnt cheap as some - but you get a lot of protein powder here at a great taste
customer_reviews.author: Zain Zaidi

customer_reviews.title: Cinnabun pleasant flavor and creamy...even if just mixed with water...
customer_reviews.text: For a protein drink this is pretty good...I can drink the cinnabun without forcing myself to finish the shake...very creamy...not over powering artificial flavor like some have, as well. There is some after taste but tolerable. I've ordered the Choc Peanut Butter and the Strawberry's and Cream, as well...they're arriving today...this should give me the variety that is helpful to stay with it...
customer_reviews.author: M. J.

customer_reviews.title: Multiple flavors, all good.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried chocolate, peanut butter cup, peanut butter marshmallow, vanilla, and s'mores. All good except the vanilla... hard pass. It's protein so suck it up and get your macros. No bloat or funny after taste. Not gritty.
customer_reviews.author: Drifter1911

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: Both my husband and I consume protein shakes for lunch, so we go through a lot of protein powder. Trutein is the best tasting and easiest on the digestion powder we have found to date. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: nmp

customer_reviews.title: Packing n shipping needs to improve
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and I love this flavor as well.. this is getting one star rating because the package and shipping control are so poor.. the item arrived with seal completed broken and powder spill everywhere inside the box
customer_reviews.author: nunu_t99

customer_reviews.title: Great Tasting
customer_reviews.text: One of the best and most consistent tasting protein brands out there. Red Velvet and Vanilla are fantastic flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Gozirra

customer_reviews.title: very bad taste
customer_reviews.text: this vanilla was horrible ,no matter what i added to it it was gross ,im still trying another flavor my son has that he said tasted way better ,but he did agree that the vanilla was horrible
customer_reviews.author: DEBBIE

customer_reviews.title: Simple or fancy-fied, it's delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this protein powder! Delicious with no aftertaste. I only make my shakes 'fancy' on training days by adding stuff and using the blender. On other days, I just throw a scoop in a blender cup with some unsweetened almond milk, shake it up, and drink it while I'm doing something else. It's that delicious that you can drink it alone.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: This tastes incredible. I mix it with Trader Joe's unsweetened almond milk and it tastes like a little post workout treat. I've also noticed more muscle, which is bc I lift heavy ass weights but obviously this helps too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good taste
customer_reviews.text: My son has been taking this protein for the past couple of years and he loves it. It has a good flavor and it helps with protein intake. We will continue buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: The flavors offered by Trutein are the best I've ever tried (and I've tried a lot). They're not chalky and blend well into whatever base you use. I usually use just water. And I really like that there is a low carb count and three types of protein. Definitely helps with appetite control.
customer_reviews.author: RoMo37

customer_reviews.title: Best protein ever
customer_reviews.text: Finally found the perfect protein!!! Tried numerous brands and over many years and this is the only one that contains whey, casein, and egg. Amazing combo and it tastes like heaven. Will be buying for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: DoctorAngus

customer_reviews.title: I’ve tried different Trutein Protein Powders and loved them all
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried different Trutein Protein Powders and loved them all. The birthday cake flavor was my least favorite. It tastes like vanilla, no cake flavor at all, very thick consistency, and hard to mix. The seller has a no return or exchanged policy according to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Danny N.

customer_reviews.title: Eh flavor.. not the best 3 out of 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: i really cant say at all the flavor was good, the taste of fake sugar really lingered on, i had to return it sorry :( i just saw with all the good reviews of flavor that it would hold up.. but eh i would pass on this one, if u are trying to decide where flavor is important, to me it is because im going to be drinking this every day..
customer_reviews.author: SuzanneBradbury

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy with my purchase, everything came on time and as ordered. I love Trutein, it’s the only protein powder I buy now. Best tasting, and quality ingredients. I get the Cinnabon, and chocolate peanut butter cup. Great for shakes and cooking. I mix in 3 tsp. of Benefiber also. Will be buying from this seller again next month.
customer_reviews.author: sylverarch

customer_reviews.title: Good quality protein.. if it sits well with your digestive system
customer_reviews.text: This is an extremely high quality protein blend and tastes very good. Easy to mix and carries substantial sweetness despite no sugar added. However, this stuff turns me into a threat to the ozone layer and is just a rough source of protein to implement into my diet. This is the first protein source that I've had this level of an issue with.
customer_reviews.author: Manny Fresh

customer_reviews.title: Yum, very pleasant.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a sample before buying this protein. At first my thought was it was very thick and chalky. After a few shakes that subsided and now it's enjoyable. I mix this with sugar free almond milk and water😊 I can't wait to buy the red Velvet next time.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and I love the color
customer_reviews.text: I love how much this tastes like red velvet cake. This a great protein powder blend made from many types of proteins. My boyfriend is obsessed with red velvet cake so for both of us to get our protein in while enjoying a great sweet “treat” is absolutely awesome. I’m excited to try this Brand’s Other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Nate J Shafou

customer_reviews.title: Amazing taste and texture!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe this was a protein shake! The taste is very delicious, just like a chocolate peanutbutter milkshake. It also lacks the grittiness and powdery feel other protein powders have. It was very smooth, velvety, and foamy. I used a "bottleblender" protein shaker to mix it up with water only. Also, this batch is new with an expiry date of November 2019.
customer_reviews.author: Ghada

customer_reviews.title: Mix-ability isn't the greatest. You will be disappointed if you try to ...
customer_reviews.text: Id give it 5 stars if it wasn't for the price. Stuff is delicious. Mix-ability isn't the greatest. You will be disappointed if you try to just pour it into your glass of milk and mix it with a fork or spoon. I tried that twice before i went out and got a protein shake container, the kind with the spring slinky ball in it for mixing. After that had no problems. I feel like its pricey but will continue to buy it when I have extra cash. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Ocker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I've been on Trutein for 3+ years now. Although Chocolate is not as wonderful tasting as Cinnabon or Banana, it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: SlyDoggyDogg68

customer_reviews.title: Not lactose free
customer_reviews.text: Again, looking for lactose free. I blame amazon filters. Why would this even be on list? Delicious but I cant drink it.
customer_reviews.author: Bradleysb

customer_reviews.title: Not all Gluten Free!!
customer_reviews.text: BE CAREFUL! NOT ALL GLUTEN FREE! Cookies-n-cream and anything that sounds like it, definitely has wheat in it.
customer_reviews.author: Prof. Honest

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I reviewed the peanut butter and chocolate flavor in the past. I mentioned that it was hard to mix. And that prevented it from getting five stars, instead I rated it at four stars. But this vanilla flavor makes it perfect. Mixes well and it taste great!
customer_reviews.author: Florian Capitulo

customer_reviews.title: Broken lid, not great first experience.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a broken lid and spilled in box. It’s not a “returnable item” so I guess I’m stuck with it 👎🏽
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddicted

customer_reviews.title: Upset Stomach
customer_reviews.text: This shake upset my stomach to the point probiotics did not help. Too bad it can't be returned after opening.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Very good flavor
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 samples and I rank them in this order: 1. Chocolate peanut butter cup 2. Lemon Meringue Pie, which pretty much tied for #1 3. Banana Cream 4. Red velvet cake. It didn't taste like red velvet to me. Tasted just plain vanilla which is weird so who knows.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle wilson

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate peanut butter is bad
customer_reviews.text: The taste of the chocolate peanut butter was terrible. I had tried the chocolate from a friend and really liked it and I assumed this flavor would be great too. I love chocolate peanut anything but this protein had a bad taste even when making shakes with banana and other smoothie additions.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Great protein powder
customer_reviews.text: Delicious! Best protein powder I have tasted. Hits all my important pieces, low carb, smooth not gritty, and tastes good!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Zerbe

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste and Flavor
customer_reviews.text: Don’t normally care for the after taste of protein drinks but I enjoy drinking this drink.
customer_reviews.author: cherconn

customer_reviews.title: Bodybuilder Recommened
customer_reviews.text: After trying multiple brands over a few years, going through and trying out at least a dozen powders, I've found the one! Trutein has the perfect balance between whey protein and added supplements including a low carb intake. The best flavor I have ever tried (chocolate). 5 out of 5 stars, use it for a meal and use it to gain good, clean lean muscle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kind of a disappointment based on reviews
customer_reviews.text: Kind of a disappointment based on reviews. It has a very gritty texture to it and kind of makes you choke if you consume it too quickly. The taste is not even worth all of the artificial sweeteners in it. There are better tasting protein powders that have high grade amino acid profile and use more natural ingredients. At least I knew what the hype was about.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Danielle Reese

customer_reviews.title: Great Profile and Great Taste
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to protein powder. Awesome profile and a great taste. Lemon Meringue Pie is a good flavor, but quite sweet. I usually have two or three flavors in my cupboard so I don't get bored. If there's one flavor you absolutely must try, it's S'mores. It's so good that I think I could get by with just the S'mores flavor for the rest of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Hero Squad

customer_reviews.title: Banana! This is theBESTFLAVOR!! We enjoy it for dessert after a workout ;)
customer_reviews.text: amazing flavor! really really good. must try! BEST protien shake ever.
customer_reviews.author: David Broussard

customer_reviews.title: Nice change in flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Love this flavor! It’s not too tart and it’s a great change from basic protein powder flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Maria A

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Tried the Banana Creme and now the Strawberries and Creme, taste wise they are both top notch, Trutein is known for their flavor profile. But obviously meant for performance and Trutein is also great in that category. Helps me tremendously from recovery to overall growth. I'm a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I got the red velvet flavor. I really like it and it keeps me satisfied a long time. Will definitely keep buying.
customer_reviews.author: EitherOr

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting hands down!
customer_reviews.text: Received TRUTEIN on time and definitely the most delicious protein shake I've ever had. I add frozen berries and almond milk to powder in blender and tastes awesome! Would 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: RED

customer_reviews.title: Tastes SO good!
customer_reviews.text: This powder blends really well, I literally put it in a water bottle and just shake it with my hand (no shaker tools) and it blends seamlessly with water! Never tried it with milk though..really good taste not super lemony and such a great price for the amount of powder!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Lieder

customer_reviews.title: Okay flavor if you dont like whey
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a protein shake that doesnt taste like whey. It still tastes like whey but the flavor of it isnt so overwhelming. You will need to blend this with almond milk or regular milk. If you use water it will not taste good at all.
customer_reviews.author: OzMoLady

customer_reviews.title: Best mixing protien
customer_reviews.text: Trutein is the best mixing protein powder and it mixes completely in water or milk without clumping. The peanut butter cup flavor tastes great !
customer_reviews.author: Jon Powers

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I usually have issues with protein but ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I usually have issues with protein but this one doesn't affect me at all. Love it so much that when I left it at home on a business trip used Amazon Prime and shipped it to my hotel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes very good
customer_reviews.text: It tastes very very good. I wish it was cheaper but I’d rather pay a bit more for this delicious protein than go with a cheap brand that tastes like sand.
customer_reviews.author: austin crowley

customer_reviews.title: Best protein mix out there imho
customer_reviews.text: Love this powder. I drink daily and mix in my creatine. Awesome flavor - can give you some gas but small price to pay. I get half my protein intake daily from this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Jayson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS STUFF! This isn't a meal replacement, but I drink one for breakfast and it keeps me full all day. I am thrilled the ingredient list is small and I'm not drinking chemicals. The flavors are great. The price compared to other shakes with similiar high quality ingredients is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Myra E. Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love all flavors of Trutein. I make shakes and ice cream with them.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great for hiking
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product because I am able to pre-measure meals for when hiking trips. Helps me to get my protein in.
customer_reviews.author: mdebnar

customer_reviews.title: Love the company, hate this flavor.
customer_reviews.text: People raved about the banana cream flavor but unfortunately I thought it was horrible. The only reason I give it a three star is because the company itself is great, just not a fan of this flavor. To me it tasted like that candy that is supposed to taste like something but it's clearly artificial flavoring. I will try another one, but I wouldn't suggest getting this one.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: 8/10 for taste and easy mixing. This product does not have any bad ...
customer_reviews.text: 8/10 for taste and easy mixing. This product does not have any bad aftertaste or cause any bloating for me. I enjoy lemon meringue flavoring and I’m very happy with the flavor of this protein. I’m excited to try other flavors. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: tyler kempf

customer_reviews.title: Flavor not as stated
customer_reviews.text: If you like the taste of Swiss Miss then buy this flavor. If you want chocolate peanut butter then buy a different brand. Other than the flavor, good product. Mixes easily in milk, coffee, or water.
customer_reviews.author: katherinekelley

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome taste. Mixes well. Didn't seem to get the number of servings listed out of it. Maybe the scoop size was too generous. I gained muscle mass.
customer_reviews.author: Praetor

customer_reviews.title: This is a really good protein powder
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good protein powder, but personally, I prefer the cinnabun flavor. It is filling, and masks the taste of the vegetables I put in my shakes. Some vegetables I like, some not so much. But I like broccoli and for the broccoli-haters out there, don't use broccoli. You can still taste it. But I really like this protein powder.
customer_reviews.author: McP

customer_reviews.title: Taste is horrible
customer_reviews.text: Birthday cake flavor is so nasty. I mixed it with milk and it's just so bad I regret buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony s

customer_reviews.title: The published formula and lack of shoddy advertising makes it feel like you're putting something quality into your body not some
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for years. The flavor is top notch. It feels quality every time I buy it. The published formula and lack of shoddy advertising makes it feel like you're putting something quality into your body not something shady. Top notch stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Moss

customer_reviews.title: Three different types of protein
customer_reviews.text: The mixology of this protein sets you up for success. The amazing flavor is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Loren

customer_reviews.title: OMG!! Sooo good!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! Soooo good! Thank you for offering trial sizes! The lemon meringue is so amazing, and makes my diet bearable. I can't wait to try the others that were delivered today (ahead of schedule).
customer_reviews.author: Ev

customer_reviews.title: It's good too.
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using this supplement for a few years now. One shake every morning. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: michael g. altman

customer_reviews.title: Mixes well with water and has lasting effects
customer_reviews.text: Product mixes very well with water. It keeps me full so it works for a meal replacement. The taste could be a little better but that's because of the casein. I have never tasted any protein with casein that was great.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't say the red velvet tastes like red velvet cake, but I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Gore

customer_reviews.title: Excellent protein powder.
customer_reviews.text: Love the flavor. Mixes well and is creamy with great taste and no after taste.
customer_reviews.author: Nursegirl621

customer_reviews.title: Use milk for flavor.
customer_reviews.text: Tastes better with milk than water. A little bit of aftertaste, but not bad. A good overall value.
customer_reviews.author: Luke A Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great
customer_reviews.text: Great Product Tastes great and has high protein content. I have tasted the mocha, vanilla, and peanut butter cup and all are superb.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting protein I have tried
customer_reviews.text: Best tasting protein I have tried. I have tried almost every brand and flavors of proteins and this is definitely the best one I have tried. Does not upset my stomach in any way and blends nicely with just shaking the shaker cup a few times. Going to stick to trutein from now on. Also great nutritional facts and the fact that they list everything and have no proprietary blends is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: edgar

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great protien, but not my favorite on the flavor. Banana Cream tastes like a candy banana would.
customer_reviews.author: ShakaBrah

customer_reviews.title: Best Protein Available
customer_reviews.text: Love it, best protein powder I have used, the wife agrees. We both use it primarily as a meal replacement in lieu of breakfast. It taste good with water, but it is fantastic when paired with Fairlife milk, which takes your protein intake over 70grams at 12oz.
customer_reviews.author: Military Tester

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, mixes well
customer_reviews.text: Great taste, use it in recipes for pancakes ect!! I mix it into my morning coffee YUM!!! Best protein powder I have tried. I reorder every 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara C.

customer_reviews.title: Very Good!
customer_reviews.text: The best tasting protein powder I have ever tried! Very hesitant when I ordered this due to the fact that I hate aftertaste. This doesn't have any- which is good. Blends well and has a thick consistency. Sadly, they don't ship to APO, so I had to have it shipped to my husband first, then to me; which is more of a hastle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strawberries & Cream Trutein sample packets
customer_reviews.text: These are very delicious mixed with almond milk or any milk of your choice, add some cream cheese for a creamy milk shake and enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: jkan

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: I usually cannot stomach protein drinks but the s'mores flavor is great. I look forward to it after a workout.
customer_reviews.author: HankHankerson

customer_reviews.title: Protein
customer_reviews.text: One of my go too for bed time protein also can use any time but the flavor is so good and is thick just blend it with water and crunch ice feels like a frosty from Wendy’s
customer_reviews.author: Saia Palei

customer_reviews.title: This is the best protein I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best protein I have ever used. The taste is great. I really like the fact it is a veteran-started business.
customer_reviews.author: Neophilus

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying this protein powder for over a year and the last one I received tastes horrible! I’m disappointed I can’t return it and revive a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: unknown

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for about five years, best protein product I could find.
customer_reviews.author: W. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Yummm!
customer_reviews.text: Best protein on the market. The combination of whey, casein, and egg white protein is great and keeps me feeling fuller longer with less bloating than other powders. I've also noticed a decrease in muscle soreness when taking this protein. Macros & taste are on point as well. Taste like a Reese's cup!
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: new favorite protein powder
customer_reviews.text: So stinkin' good! Tastes like there are real strawberries! This is my new favorite protein powder! Thick and delicious! Mixes well with water--which is something I thought I'd never say! (before now, I used to ALWAYS mix my protein powder with milk/almond milk to make it taste better---but there's no need with this amazing stuff!)
customer_reviews.author: Aubre

customer_reviews.title: best protein i've ever used and will only use this from now on
customer_reviews.text: i wish they'd sponsor me by now :( my favorite protein powder!!
customer_reviews.author: Fabio

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Just great! If you need an after workout protein shake and are in your cutting phase, this is the stuff!
customer_reviews.author: SSeales

customer_reviews.title: Tasty!
customer_reviews.text: Overall like the product- my biggest issue is lumps can come and I can’t seem to shake them free. Good taste.
customer_reviews.author: Kim kenzal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this several times, delicious lemon except, I received banana. But it's pretty good too.
customer_reviews.author: priscilla

customer_reviews.title: This new flavor is AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: This new flavor is AMAZING!!!! Hands down best tasting protein I've ever had, it's like candy, and I want to keep drinking it all day.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

product_meta.title: Body Nutrition Trutein Chocolate Peanut Butter 4lbs Protein Shakes/Shake, Meal Replacement Drink Mix, Post/Pre Workout Shake Powder, Breakfast Shake.
feature_bullets: Low carb & Keto Friendly It mixes easily without lumps.
Whey digests quickly and is rich in branched-chain amino acids (BCAAs) which plays a major role in promoting muscle growth and recovery after resistance and endurance exercise.
For Muscle Gain- Research has consistently confirmed whey protein's ability to promote muscle mass and recovery.
For Weight Loss-These weight loss benefits stem mainly from whey protein’s ability to decrease appetite, making you feel fuller throughout the day.
Although not everyone needs protein powder supplements, they can assist you if you do strength training or cannot meet your protein needs with diet alone.
